data.title: Buy Epoxy Resin: Purchase Your Clear Resin Kits: Free US Delivery
data.meta_description: Buy Epoxy Resin With Free Us Delivery. Create Stunning Projects With Ease Using Our High-quality Epoxy Resin. Shop Now & Bring Your Creative Visions To Life!
data.text:
Shop Epoxy Resin For Art Projects

Need a high-quality clear epoxy resin for your next art project? Look no further than ArtResin.

Professional artists, photographers, jewelry creators, beginners and crafting enthusiasts worldwide love and trust ArtResin. ArtResin is non-toxic and provides a gorgeous, glossy finish with exceptional protection against yellowing.

ArtResin was created by two artists who wanted a crystal clear finish to elevate the value of their work while still protecting their health with a resin that was safe.

In ArtResin’s online store, you’ll find our easy-to-use, high-quality epoxy resins for sale in a variety of sizes. All you have to do is measure, mix, pour, and leave to dry - just 4 simple steps and your piece is ready!

Transform Your Projects With High-Quality Clear Epoxy Resin From A Supplier You Can Trust

ArtResin’s online store makes it easy to stock up on the epoxy resin and other craft supplies you need to get creative. We offer free shipping on qualifying orders and a tracking number so you can follow your order from our door to yours.

Unlike most companies, we manufacture our own resin at our facility in Dallas, Texas. Starting with the raw ingredients, ArtResin is prepared to the highest quality and safety standards. It contains no harmful VOCs, no BPAs and no fumes and is safe for use at home when used as directed. It’s non-flammable, non-toxic and conforms to ASTM D-4236.

What’s more, ArtResin has both UV and HALS stabilizers to offer superior protection against the yellowing effects of UV light.

Give Your Artwork A Sleek & Modern Finish

Our premium quality kits are available in various quantities, so take your pick and get creative.

ArtResin is perfect for giving your artwork & craft a glossy, modern look. Use it to coat paintings, photographs, wood, table tops, tables, and other furniture and to create flow art, resin geodes, coasters, tumblers, ornaments, and many other art & decor pieces, great for gifts.

Whether you’re a first-time user of resin, a beginner or a seasoned pro, check out our blog for valuable tips, ideas, help, and tutorials, all about resin art.

Benefits of ArtResin

Easy to use kit for any DIY project.

Non-toxic & safe for home use in a well-ventilated space.

No VOCs. No BPA. No fumes. Non-flammable. Food safe once cured.

UV and HALS stabilized for protection against yellowing.

Formulated specifically for arts and crafting.

High gloss, crystal clear, strong and durable.

Video & blog tutorials and customer service support.

Made in the USA.

Made by a leading supplier.

Ideal for casting, coating, pouring, as well as for paint and adhesive (glue) applications.

Heat resistant (maximum temperature that cured ArtResin can tolerate is 120F or 50C.)

Easy 1:1 mixing ratio.

ArtResin products increase the attractiveness & value of all things it's used on. Go ahead: Make Your Art POP.

Shop our epoxy resin kits for beginners.
